rootCauses.description: Token lacks permissions for specific products

immediate.title: Fix Status Code Expectations
immediate.description: Update tests to accept 401/403 as valid responses for restricted endpoints

immediate.title: Improve Error Handling
immediate.description: Add proper null checks and error response validation
immediate.implementation: Update test assertions to handle undefined properties

immediate.title: Add Rate Limiting Protection
immediate.description: Implement delays between requests in comprehensive tests

strategic.title: Token Permission Analysis
strategic.description: Validate which products the current token can access

strategic.title: Adaptive Test Strategy
strategic.description: Skip tests for endpoints without proper permissions

strategic.title: Mock Responses for Restricted Endpoints
strategic.description: Use mock data when real endpoints are not accessible
strategic.implementation: Implement Cypress intercept for restricted APIs

recommendations: Focus on fixing status code expectations (immediate 40% improvement)
Validate token permissions per product (strategic improvement)
